kubejs.ponder.soul_pedestal_scene.text_1: Place the Soul Pedestal and then place 8 Pedestals as shown.
kubejs.ponder.soul_pedestal_scene.text_2: Place your offerings on the Pedestals surrounding the Soul Pedestal - in any order.
kubejs.ponder.soul_pedestal_scene.text_3: Place your filled Soul Crystal on the Soul Pedestal.
kubejs.ponder.soul_pedestal_scene.text_4: Right click the Soul Pedestal with an empty hand to activate.
